Package io.wcm.devops.conga.plugins.aem.handlebars.helper

package io.wcm.devops.conga.plugins.aem.handlebars.helper
CONGA handlebars helper plugins for AEM.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AemCryptoEncryptHelper
    Handlebars helper that encrypts a given string with AEM crypto key.
    AemDispatcherFilterHelper
    Handlebars helper that generates AEM dispatcher ANY access rules from a given object structure as defined by https://docs.adobe.com/docs/en/dispatcher/disp-config.html#par_134_32_0009
    AemHttpdFilterHelper
    Handlebars helper that generates HTTPd access rules.
    HttpdCloudManagerConditionalHelper
    Checks if there is a conditional statement 'httpd.cloudManagerConditional' in the current context.
    HttpHostHelper
    Handlebars helper that adds a port to the host when it is not the default one
    HttpHostSslHelper
    Handlebars helper that adds a port to the host when it is not the default one
    OakAuthorizableUuidHelper
    Handlebars helper that builds a password hash for a given password string of an Oak JCR user.
    OakPasswordHashHelper
    Handlebars helper that builds a password hash for a given password string of an Oak JCR user.
    WebConsolePasswordHashHelper
    Handlebars helper that builds a password hash for a given password string for the Apache Felix Webconsole (felix.webconsole.password).
    WithAllCloudManagerConditionalHelper
    Checks if there is a conditional statement 'httpd.cloudManagerConditional' in the current context.
